/usr/bin/c++    -pthread -fopenmp  -march=native -msse4.2 -mfpmath=sse  -march=native -mavx2  -march=native -mfma  -std=c++14 -pthread -fopenmp  -march=native -msse4.2 -mfpmath=sse  -march=native -mavx2  -march=native -mfma   CMakeFiles/demo_CH_stream.dir/demo_CH_stream.cpp.o  -o ../../../bin/demo_CH_stream -rdynamic ../../../lib64/libChronoEngine.so -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/opt/chrono/chrono_build/lib64:
